name: Storm at Sea
description:
Storm at Sea

The sea is a cruel mistress.
You no longer have control over your ship, only a direction and time before the storm hits.
Save as much cargo as you can.
Your faith is in the Sea's control, and she will have none of it.

Controls

Arrow : Crane movement
Left mouse click : Activating/ deactivating the crane’s magnet
Escape: Return to main menu
Enter: spawn crates and start timer

Credits

Olivier Boily : Asset artist
